46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Umar, may Allah be pleased with them said:"There was a Makhzumi woman who used to borrow things, saying that her neighbors needed the, then she would deny that she had borrowed the, so the Messenger of Allah ordered that her hand be cut off

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَكُونُ حِرْزًا وَمَا لاَ يَكُونُ
chapter.eng-name: Stealing Something that Is Kept In A Protected Place
